documents.document: @poneilinOttawa The Sun continues to shed talent. Sad to watch from the outside. I can't imagine the mood in the newsroom. Keep up the fight
@spark_show In this case, Fox knew about the error and fixed their story, but forgot the tweet. Deleting it was the right thing to do. 2/2
@spark_show Intentionally spreading "fake news" is wrong and it's not journalism. It's actually the exact opposite. 1/2
@spark_show @katepurchase That's not censorship. That's responsible journalism. @FoxNews did the right thing here. 2/2
@spark_show @katepurchase I went to journalism school. When you get something wrong (it happens to us all) you retract it and apologize. 1/2

@TransLink The senior I met this morning doesn't have internet, so I told him I'd let you know. I'm sure C23 drivers can confirm.
@ace_bradley @TransLink It's been a mess since they changed the routes. So many people on Beach getting passed by multiple full shuttles.
@TransLink Already emailed on Monday, but it happened again today. It happens every day. The C23 is reliably unreliable since the change.
@TransLink This change has really messed up the Beach Ave route. Today I met a senior at the Aquatic Centre who was passed multiple times.
@TransLink Whatever change you made to the C21 / C23 route on Beach Ave. is now a nightmare. Full shuttles are passing 12+ people at stops.
